website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Gratis-Bungee is an overall lifestyle sneaker that uses technologies like Air Cooling Memory Foam on its midsole, mesh panels on its upper, and flexible rubber outsole for comfort, breathability, and traction. The high number of reviews concur the pleasing experience of wearing these shoes; some are even suffering from foot pain. More so, the slip-on design makes it very convenient to slip on and off and is appreciated by a lot of consumers.
pros: Majority of the users rave about the all-day comfort that the Skechers Gratis - Bungee provides and described the feeling as walking on clouds
These sneakers will work well for people who walk long distances or need to be on their feet all day
Several reviewers who suffer from foot problems like rheumatoid arthritis were able to walk long distances wearing these shoes
A significant number of online commenters love the bungee laces and the slip-on design of these sneakers
Not only is there no need to tie the shoelaces, but it also makes slipping on and off the shoe very easy and convenient
A high number of buyers praised the cooling effect of the memory foam of these shoes
Numerous commenters noted that they love the Gratis - Bungee so much that they purchased several pairs for back up
One purchaser gives plus points on the intricate design of these sneakers
A couple of reviewers noted that these sneakers are easy to clean and maintain
Moreover, it can be machine-washed, adding to its convenience
These shoes are offered at a great value given its comfort and quality, said a handful of testers
A few buyers were able to use these for exercising and did not have complaints
Majority of the users claim that the Gratis - Bungee fit true to size
cons: Some users noted that the back part of the shoe is lower than the front
It causes their heel to slip and the socks to get sucked on the sneaker
One purchaser was disappointed with the gray colorway shoe because it depicted a different color in real life and on the website
The outsole collects little rocks, said one buyer
A couple of testers mention that these lack arch support

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I work in a healthcare setting where I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I work in a healthcare setting where I do a lot of walking. These shoes slip on and off easily and are very comfortable and lightweight for all day wear. This is the 3rd pair of Skechers with memory foam that I've purchased. I have one for home and this pair for work which replaced the last pair that I wore out. The grey is a nice light shade that looks great with most colors (I wear a variety of solid colored scrubs). The pink is a bright, kind of neon shade. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J&TW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe. They are a little tight but I think wearing them will help loosen them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque96

customer_reviews.title: NOT CONSTRUCTED FOR NORMAL WEAR / NOT LONG LASTING
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Skechers and I want to like them but I will NOT purchase another again. They just DO NOT hold up. The memory foam breaks down and the top stitching across the toe including the material used is cheap and lasts no time!!!! I keep my toenails cut close and still a hole developed in each shoe!!!!! after only two months and light wear. This equals a poor investment for my money and I do not care to make billionairness Brooke Burke any richer.
customer_reviews.author: Siciliangirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was nice, the insole is comfortable. The memory foam didn't make the shoe too tight for once. It was NOT cooling however-I'm not sure how they can get away with advertising that because it's very untrue. I was worried the elastic would stretch out too easy based on other reviews, but even if it did, there are eyelets that you could use to out laces in. I did return these however, because when I walked in them the material above the toes would kind of 'fold in' and press onto my toes and became painful.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H

customer_reviews.title: Nice color/weird heel
customer_reviews.text: fit well but as another stated, the heel is something else:( it DOES feel as the right shoe is slipping off when i am on the treadmill but it is NOT coming off. the heel is just low. they are comfy and the gun color is awesome. i ordered them cause i dont like tying my shoes when i am dressing in a hurry AND i wanted a solid color since i mostly like rainbow brite colored shoes...you know...really COLORFUL. i would buy again. wore them the first time at the gym doing the treadmill, stairmaster and bike
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. It took me over 20 years to realize I was buying the wrong size of athletic shoes. I had always bought a size 7 when I needed a size 8 for this type of shoe. Made all the difference in the world. I love the color and I especially love the fact they don't use shoe laces, they use a bungee type cord so they are easy to slip on and off. I always have to tie shoe laces twice and I still have the problem with the laces coming undone. These shoes take care of that problem nicely and I purchased them in two additional colors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I (typically) love Skechers. And I love the look and quality of these shoes. BUT, the fit is not quite right. Because of the aforementioned strengths, I decided to keep these shoes, but ended up replacing the insoles. Also, my left foot is more slender and longer than my right (typically not a problem with Skechers) and with this shoe, I am realizing I still need to add a pad under the insole at the ball of the shoe for optimal comfort. As cute and durable as this shoe is, I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had any problems with these shoes. I was nervous as some reviews talked about be knock off brands. I wear these to work, and all around my house as I don’t have carpet. I wore the pervious ones out that I bought at sketchers and I’m happy with this purchase. Side note, most shoes stores don’t have my size (5.5 us) So I was glad to see they had my size online
customer_reviews.author: Linda Foggin

customer_reviews.title: Feel Better than They Look
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a little disappointing. Skechers have been my favorite shoe for years, so I was excited to find them at such a great price. These shoes seem to be well constructed, but run a little bit big & move around slightly when walking. The biggest disappointment was the knit fabric that the upper shoe is made of. They borderline on ugly but the good craftsmanship & comfort of the shoes outweigh the looks of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dbee

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a half size larger than usual for enough room at end of big toe. I tried them on at an area department store before I bought online to make sure I was getting the right size. The ones I bought here were only half the price of the department store shoes -- and exactly the same. This was also the color of blue I had been looking for. Goes great with every shade of blue denim jeans. So comfortable I can walk in them all day! I can't wear this type of shoe if the arch is too high, but these are just right.
customer_reviews.author: homebody

customer_reviews.title: No to Sketchers.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit just fine but unfortunately I did not realize that they had an elastic 'tie' which didn't give me the comfort fit I was looking for'. I cut the elastic in hope of putting in a real shoe lace but alas discovered the elastic was permanently anchored and could not be removed. The shoe was not designed to have a real shoe lace. It was my responsibility to recognize the structure of the shoe but truly sad that the shoes went from box to the trash bin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Found my inner Cinderella!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have so much trouble getting comfortable shoes, of any kind, due to multiple foot issues....These slip on Sketchers, have a nice wide toe bed, (difficult to find these days), do not at all hit my bunions, and have enough support for my flat feet. They are also just right, fitting on the tops of my feet, as well, which swell right up in most shoes. I really hope they keep this style around, as I have finally found my go to Athletic shoe. We will be hiking in the South West soon, after which I may even write a second review.
customer_reviews.author: Orene Morin

customer_reviews.title: Off center construction on left shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes and immediately tried them on....the right foot fit perfectly while the left foot was somewhat turned in. Although, I liked the appearance of the shoe, walking for any length of time would be uncomfortable. The left shoe, appears to be constructed somewhat off center and turned in. The right shoe is perfect. Also noted, the shoe is a bit of a tight fit at the toe, and will need very thin socks. Customer service with amazon was wonderful, offering a refund upon return.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Lady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. These shoes are very soft and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. These shoes are very soft and flexible. I have a very hard time looking for shoes because I have wide feet. These shoes don't seem as wide as you think, but the shoe forms into the size that's needed. I am a nurse and hardly sit at all for nine hours. My go to shoes are sketchers. The fo insoles are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Skechers - the only shoe I wear but have had to return a few pair of them too. NO shoe is perfect but this brand is my favorite...especially the slip-ons and the walking shoes. I really like these and the Navy ones I bought in October. I have a high instep but these are both very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam lacking in arch support
customer_reviews.text: these do not have nearly the same arch support that the previous Skechers Gratis shoes I have owned, I feel my foot rolling inwards also. I bought these to wear around the house, so they will do the job, but I couldn't wear these walking around all day without arch pain.
customer_reviews.author: llj0317

customer_reviews.title: Great low riding shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for the price. They fit perfectly, and are very comfortable both with and without socks. I got them quite wet and they didn't take very long to dry at all. I like that I don't have to tie laces, and the tongue doesn't stick out or move around. These are great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: anon ymous

customer_reviews.title: but once you get your foot in there it fits nice. She hasn't had them on too long yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who has a wide foot,they are a bit snug to put on,but once you get your foot in there it fits nice.She hasn't had them on too long yet,but she is hard to buy for and she does seem happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: binky zzz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I have problems with my feet . Pins in my toes etc . I did some research on these even asked total strangers who I spotted wearing them what they thought. All positive reviews .?Will purchase several more pairs because we all know how it goes when we find a product we love ( they discontinue it lol)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: these conditions make it very difficult to find shoes that fit and are comfortable. When I find a brand I like
customer_reviews.text: I have very unusual feet. A longer toe on one foot, some neuropathy, wider feet and some edema (swelling) . Also my feet get hot very quickly which is uncomfortable. Taken together, these conditions make it very difficult to find shoes that fit and are comfortable. When I find a brand I like, I tend to buy several pair from that brand. This is one of those brands. They are very comfortable and lightweight. And I agree with the other reviewer - Skechers needs to add more colors and styles in the wider width. I would buy them!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: I love the comfort of the light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of the light weight. The fit is perfect. They are very comfortable to wear for long periods and on long walks. My first pair is almost 2 years old and just starting to wear down, however I wear them constantly. I ordered these as replacement because I was afraid they would be discontinued. There isn't anything I don't like about them!
customer_reviews.author: kevin summerville

customer_reviews.title: My Best
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sketches. They fit Perfect. They are light like you don't have anything on your feet☆☆☆ I will never purchase any other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. BRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed not as flexible as previous papers of the same model, but as they were too long, that may be a deceptive result. They did in fact feel quite wide enough for my wide feet, but too long as is I were wearing size 9 rather than 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vanderwood

customer_reviews.title: Long feet problems strike again
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying this shoe. I wear them for work and tend to have to buy shoes every 2 years. They are comfortable once you "break them in". My issue with them is at the top of the shoe. It wants to turn my big toe more to its curve, which makes my foot hurt, until the shoe gets in alignment with me. This also happened when I brought this shoe the first time. After a couple of weeks, it stops. My coworker has the same shoe and she has no problem with it. She wears a 7 and I wear an 11.
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: Not the size / width we ordered
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not the size we ordered. We got wide , ordered medium. And also 1 size too large. Were these sizes changed ?We are going to re order size 7 , not 7.5 This shoe is way too big. The old pair we had were 7's , but are the same size as other 7 1/2 we have , hence why we ordered 7 1/2 this time . Now these are too large. Now have to order size 7 .
customer_reviews.author: M. J. swink

customer_reviews.title: Not to be worn with thin socks
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute shoe and I've received compliments. It has a comfortable sole and cushion, however, I still get blisters on the back of my heel. I have to wear thick socks, which make the shoe too tight, to protect my foot. I thought it was a matter of breaking them in but it still continues after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Casado

customer_reviews.title: At least I can still put these on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from Amazon because the price was better than at the outlet store. I did try them on there, but for some reason, the ones from Amazon are a bit snug. I can still fit my feet in with socks, so going to break them in and see if they loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some other Skechers last year and wanted the same exact pair, of course they were no longer available. I found these. They fit perfect. I usually wear a 9 wide but in Skechers every pair I own has been 8 1/2 C/D. These are very comfortable and look great even with dress clothes at work! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Catlady

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like Skechers but they always seem to be a bit soft in the arch support area. So are these. I love the bungee cord lacing. They are attractive but I wish I could have found them with an accent color
customer_reviews.author: POPS N MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet and its hard to find a shoe, even one with wide with that doesn't still hurt my feet but these don't. They are the most comfortable pair of shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha D Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Would Love  to love it.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great looking. The length is perfect size. Because of the memory insoles it’s tight. I’m hoping to stretch it out or something so I can wear it longer in the day. Wider base may be too lose so I don’t know if that would be better? I’ve had other sketchers that I’m still using because they are like not wearing anything on your feet but this one I need to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, but if you need shoes for a Lot of walking or longtime standing, these are Not the shoes. No Arch support whatsoever.. Great for wearing casually and Not for long periods of time if you need arch support..
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This my second pair of the Skechers Bungee sneakers. I like the idea that I don't have to lace them, but they still look like regular sneakers and not slip on sneakers. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: IRC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, light and comfortable and easy to just slip them on. True to color...comfortable to wear all day and then some...I want to get them in black too
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this style.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Skechers for years. This style fits me the best. Easy to get on, and a very nice looking shoe. This is my second pair of this style.
customer_reviews.author: doggiemom

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time on my feet as a teacher. These shoes have made my feet, knees and hips very happy! The price at which I purchased these on Amazon was half what I paid on sale from my favorite department store. So much cheaper that I purchased two pairs!
customer_reviews.author: cfj

customer_reviews.title: This is my first pair of shoes with memory foam ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of shoes with memory foam. I will definitely buy Skechers with memory foam in the future! I usually wear Aasics for my running shoes, but I wanted some that looked cuter than just for running. These are really cute with shorts and jeans, and I will even try to pull them off for work. One note, you definitely need no-show socks for these if you are wearing them with shorts or capris.
customer_reviews.author: lilly's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are probably the best fitting most comfortable shoe I have had in over 20 years oh, these are so comfortable and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: The ease putting the shoes on. When walking on the the memory foam it was easy to walk a long time without the need to sit down and rest..It was a little large on the right foot but after wearing for a while it has conformed to my foot. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at the store for almost double the cost. I saw them and ordered them and they were just like the store ones. Same fit. Same style.
customer_reviews.author: Raebe

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half-size up after reading the reviews, and I now wish I had ordered a full size up. I normally wear a 7, ordered a 7.5, and this shoe looks like a child's shoe next to my others. They stretched a bit after wetting and wearing around. Skechers used to be my favorite shoe brand. But I think this will be my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Love! Very cute and trendy in the althleisure sense
customer_reviews.text: Love! Very cute and trendy in the althleisure sense. I wouldn't recommend this as a good workout shoe because it's very soft, but it's perfect for walking around. If your foot is very narrow, this shoe fits loose.
customer_reviews.author: MarisSM

customer_reviews.title: Rubs heels funny
customer_reviews.text: After two days my heels have blisters. Something about the back just rubs there wrong. Super disappointed because otherwise they are a nice looking shoe and the sole is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes — better than kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won’t wear any other shoes now!! She wore these all through 3rd grade and 4th grade - she has big feet!! They held up through all the feet dragging, running, mud puddles. These are so much better than the kids’ Skechers that fall apart in a week
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Chambers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I like the elastic very much. The only thing I don't like is the tread on the bottom collects little rocks -- not a problem if you remove your shoes in the house, but a problem if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! I have feet problems and these provide amazing comfort that eases most of my pain. I ordered the black with pink trim, and I well say the pink wore off rather quickly BUT, I do wear these every day so I've probably given them a bit more wear and tear than most people. I just ordered another pair in another color today. Very pleased with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She likes them but says they run a bit small. We had to exchange for half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great as I can put them on one handed easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I am handicapped and only my right arm works. These shoes are great as I can put them on one handed easily and the memory foam is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Frye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sneakers I've ever had. The first 2 pair were in white and they did show dirt shortly after some wear. I loved the slip on /no lace up. So comfortable. My dog chewed the built in laces of my second pair which couldn't be repaired. I ordered the gray/pink colors this time. Can't go wrong with these shoes and well worth the price. I still have the dog :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patti Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them on sale
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got them on sale. I would have been very upset had I paid full price. Great shoes for short trips to the store, but if you're going to the mall shopping, the comfort won't be there after a couple of hours. I was looking for a good walking shoe and these aren't it.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I like them! My feet are wide and they fit perfect. I like that they are light, not heavy. I like not having to tie them..just slip on.
customer_reviews.author: butch russell

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. They fit well and are very comfortable and nice looking. Well made
customer_reviews.author: MADELEINE S.

customer_reviews.title: Skecher Addict
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it's comfortable during my time at work I'm on my feet for 13 hours it was totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Nice looking shoe, but too wide around the back for someone like me with narrow feet and slim ankles. A smaller size would have been too short, but my usual size did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers are my "go to" work shoes. They are comfortable & I love them. No leg fatigue for me at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived the day of trick or treat. I wore them for the hour and a half hike through our and the surrounding neighborhoods. At the end of the night my feet felt fine and the shoes were still comfortable. I have very high arches and trouble with my plantar muscles, I was very surprised at how well these shoes fit and the comfort. I will definitely buy another pair probably in another color to switch them out so they don't wear out as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Replaces similar one I had without a back ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Replaces similar one I had without a back to it. I much prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 92 year old Mom. She loves them and wears them every day. I bought them for her also in black and white
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, great Slip-On sneaker! Great for seniors too!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, fit perfectly, wear them constantly . I use them Around the house instead of loose fitting slippers that us older people can find a little dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: GmaShops

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been a skechers girl for years. Always pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these shoes. I am sticking to Sketchers from now on. This is my 3rd pair & I've been happy with them all.
customer_reviews.author: weez

customer_reviews.title: Feet going numb.
customer_reviews.text: This sketcher runs narrower then my older model. they also causes my foot to go numb. A friend of mine got the same shoe in regular width and had same problem with feet going numb. Bad design!
customer_reviews.author: Great Aunt Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Not as cushiony as I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Not as cushiony as I thought it would be to walk around DC for a weekend, but they are very comfortable. I actually have a pair of Danskin flats that have Memory Foam that I wear at home as slippers and they are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tutey

customer_reviews.title: Well made sneakers. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: These starting out are very tight. I have a wide foot. I kept wearing them and they Finley broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I normally wear an 8 wide, but wear a 7-1/2 wide in Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Graham

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Sport Women's Gratis Bungee Fashion Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Skechers Sport Women's Gratis Bungee Fashion Sneaker comfortable, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Color is not actually gray.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I am a little disappointed in the color....I thought they would be gray, but they are actually more silver. Guess I’m going to have join that Silver Sneakers program I’ve been avoiding!
customer_reviews.author: Sneekers

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE SKECHERS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE SKECHERS!! That's all I wear now. I'm happy with all 7 pairs. If you have flat feet, make sure you get the wide shoe. So far I can wear the reg. B width on sandals only. I have to stick to Wide width when there are sides on the shoes!! These were reg B width=snug fit for me/but that's my fault!!
customer_reviews.author: tous

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my work. They don't slip on the floor and no shoe strings coming undone. They fit like a good pair of slippers and I need the wide width. I am definitely going get these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Talada

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are like the a previous pair I have except for cosmetic differences that sneaker-makers can't seem to resist playing with. They are very comfortable for walking, which is my main use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan French

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just like these sneakers. This is my third pair. I spilled some paint on the older pair so they are work sneakers now.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I chose the wide and it was a perfect fit . I usually but regular width and my pinky toe rips a hole in the side. these have lasted and no pinky hole.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Arelis

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, not love just like. There's a little too much arch support for me. But overall they fit well & are nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: AJKalena

customer_reviews.title: A bit large, but loved them if they for correctly
customer_reviews.text: I have had many sketchers before, these were bigger than another pair of the same size. Had to give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: ... have the Gratis 66 Sketchers and they are my favorite!! I was hoping for more colors so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the Gratis 66 Sketchers and they are my favorite!! I was hoping for more colors so I got the navy/white but it wasn't exactly like my old ones. The material is harder (scratchier feel) and the fit was slightly looser than the Gratis 66. Cushion is the same comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I always love Skechers, and this time I got them with a very good deal. The only thing I see in this shoes is that people with wide feet, can't even try because they aren't wide.
customer_reviews.author: Faga3

customer_reviews.title: These have no arch support at all. They run ...
customer_reviews.text: These have no arch support at all. They run small. Are very tight at the back of heel. I would not purchase again. Hoping the back will stretch out and not cut into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Sport Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, love the fit of these shoes. Skechers are awesome sport shoes. I love the style because they look dressy enough to wear with nice slacks or jeans. Would highly recommend these if you want a cute shoe that is comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love Skechers but I think they are too expensive for how quickly they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes! They are my absolute favorite and I'm glad that Skechers is still making them, they have tons more colors now which is awesome. Buy a pair you will not regret it. They run true to size for me. I'm a size 9 in womens and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Young

customer_reviews.title: These were a perfect fit and find
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect fit and find, until they began to fall apart. Didn't wear right away and now after 2 months of wear, the mess is beginning to tear on both shoes. Always purchase Skechers shoes for work. Worst construction as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: lunchbreak

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe! I got the gold color and really ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe! I got the gold color and really like how it looks- it's more of a subtle champagne gold. The foam does get a little warm, but it doesn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: The Plunge

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that DO NOT  hurt
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. My feet are extremely hard to fit ad well as being "ouchy". I can wear these Sketchers all day and without mt pooe feet complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No arch support, too wide
customer_reviews.text: These are not great. The sole is very cushy, but without any arch support I still had to add an insole. I wear a 9.5 wide and ordered my normal size. The shoes seem too wide and after a few weeks offered no lateral support whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Reuss

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight, no cushion around the heel area inside the shoe. Even though the size fit well, they gave me quite a blister on my heel after only wearing them for 4 hours. Memory foam not quite as good as the Skechers Burst. Too bad, it's a nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Mollineaux

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super Comfortable and cute. They are brighter than expected but still cute. The pink is towards the coral side and very bright. I'm a Dental Assistant and running around all day. No laces to come undone and really comfy all day.
customer_reviews.author: loriell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but not made to last
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel. However after wearing for 2 days, part of the sole tread came loose. Because I love the shoes, I superglued the tread. Three weeks later, the tread at the toe on the same shoe came loose, which I also superglued. One week after that the original tread came loose again - 3 strikes your out. Shoes were returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Breaking in a pair of Skechers
customer_reviews.text: The problem is that the width is a bit tight (perhaps because the sides are not fabric) and the first time I have to "break in" a pair and not wear them all day on the very first day. They are now fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them once. They felt like I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not as well-fitting as I hoped, and I ordered the same size as both my other pairs of Sketchers. It may just be personal preference, but I didn't like the feel of it on so returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: arch support is average, they seem a little narrow in the toe area compared to my regular walking sketchers. I think these will feel better once I have worn them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are a little big and since they don’t have laces I can’t tie them tighter. I do like them. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: A little loose but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looser than other sneakers purchased in different color. Still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and easy to slip on and off. Great looking also
customer_reviews.author: Monica G Loupe

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run small, so get a half size bigger. It's an okay shoe overall..I am on my feet a lot and they wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not for inclement weather
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneaker. Only complaint is that these shoes are not good in the rain or snow. They get water in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mercado

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. My wife shoes weared out after less than couple months use as shown in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom really digs these shoes. (Still trying to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Mom really digs these shoes. (Still trying to figure out, though, if a recently developed propensity for stumbling & falling has anything to do with the shoes, or her age. If can rule that out, I'll come back & edit the star rating to '5'.)
customer_reviews.author: ibdubbya

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I read that these run large, so I ordered 1/2 size smaller. Very comfy and easy to quickly put on and head out the door!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and it feels so comfortable even when wearing for a long period of time. No laces to tie, just push in my feet and I am ready to go. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pee

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Gratis Bungee Fashion Sneaker
